name: ghost-prismatic
notes: Colorful crystalline shards with visible hue variation. High fracture separates faces enough for prismatic palette to shine.

name: prismatic-dark-sparse
notes: Jewel-toned fragments. Low luminosity prevents additive blowout, preserving color differences between faces.

name: all-zero
notes: Intimate and starlike. Minimal element count makes individual glow dots readable. Surprisingly beautiful.

name: sparse-ghost
notes: Angular, architectural, readable. Individual triangular faces visible. Structure reads as constructed.

name: all-min-except-lum
notes: Compact bright core with visible sparkle dots around it. Same geometry as all-zero but fully lit.

name: sweet-spot
notes: Balanced midpoint. Good density without blowout, moderate fracture preserves form.

name: scattered-nebula
notes: High density + high fracture. Dual bright lobes with scattered geometry. Nebula-like.

name: structured-scatter
notes: High coherence + high fracture. Tests whether structure survives scattering. Dual-lobe form persists.
